channel.description: Hey Mopararians!, I need help with these problems i don't know how to work with "NPCDROP.TSM" some one can tell me how? btw im using ErasedPkz as my base.

item.title: [PI] Adding NPC DROPS/RATES
item.dc:creator: @zzjimmy zzjimmy
item.description:
@zzjimmy wrote:

#sergeant strongstack 6261:150 995:20000 808:129 886:127 391:2 207:2 3051:2 213:2 11710:1 11712:1 11714:1 11724:1 11726:1 11728:1 989:1

the first set of numbers after the name are, npcId:rare drop rate. The numbers following that are common drops and it is itemId:amount. The line below that shows the rare drops like this, itemId:amount.

Read full topic
